title: Immersed
description: Just when she thought it was safe to step into the light.After a daring escape from Elore, Avlyn finds that the Outerbounds isn't the haven of freedom she's hoped for. No one seems to trust anyone. And Avlyn's unique ability to control technology through Immersion marks her as a valuable but dangerous tool.A tool that everyone wants to control.
author: Jenetta Penner
